titleStmt.title: A treatise intitled, Beware of M. Iewel. By Iohn Rastel Master of Arte and student of diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Jewel, John. A replie unto M. Hardinges answeare.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
